channel.title: I need help on uploading a whole foldernot just opening the folder and use file
channel.description:
okay so i'm having a problem, i went to mediafire.com to upload my new client for my server and i clicked browse and found my folder 'client' in my documents, i double clicked it and it went to the files, i don't want to upload 1 file, i want to upload the whole folder but how?
ex. i can only upload run.bat, when i wanna upload the folder 'client' with the cache,run.bat,client,classes ect

item.title: I need help on uploading a whole foldernot just opening the folder and use file
item.dc:creator: @elijah101 elijah101
item.description:
@elijah101 wrote:

CoonHunter:

Convert the folder to either a .zip or a .rar file. That will solve your problem

Thanks, i’m new to uploading stuff sorry for my noobness =P

Read full topic
item.source: I need help on uploading a whole foldernot just opening the folder and use file
